snippet: Rory McIlroy and Vijay Singh shared a six-under-par lead when Saturday’s third round of the P.G.A. Championship was postponed because of heavy rain.
abstract: Rory McIlroy and Vijay Singh share a six-under-par lead when the third round of the PGA Championship is postponed because of heavy rain.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy and Vijay Singh shared a six-under-par lead when Saturday’s third round of the P.G.A. Championship was postponed because of heavy rain.

headline.seo: P.G.A. Championship — McIlroy and Singh Lead When Play Stops
headline.main: McIlroy and Singh Share Lead as Heavy Rain Stops Play
headline.print_headline: Heavy Rain Arrives, Play Stops, and McIlroy and Singh Share the Lead
